participant_abstract.sent: The goal of this meeting was to discuss the crucial points necessary for a first prototyping.
Solar power supply will be used and part of the material will be wood, as brought by the industrial designer Baba.
The user interface designer David pushed for speech and gesture recognition, but it was discussed to be a risky technology for a first implementation.
The fashion trends are fruits and vegetables, and the fancy look-and-feel seems to be the key point from a user point a view.
Decisions have been made at the end of the meeting.

participant_actions.sent: ID look and feel design UID user interface design ME product evaluation

participant_decisions.sent: Wood material (partly). spongy feeling. fruits-vegetable inspired. solar power supply.

participant_problems.sent: Deciding if speech or gesture recognition
